_comment.text: There are some optional config options. Default values are listed below

massages.prompt_complete: Scan the QR code above or open the following link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_no_qr_complete: Open the following link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_incomplete: Scan the QR code above or open the following link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_no_qr_incomplete: Open the following link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_code: Once you're in, enter the following code:
